features.additionalInfo: See, track and easily pay your bills online in NetBank or on the go in the CommBank app.
Wherever you are in the world, CommBank gives you the choice and control to securely manage all of your accounts on a range of devices, the way you want.
Wondering how to teach your child to earn, save and spend their money responsibly  The CommBank Youth app gives under 14s hands-on experience that's fun and secure.

features.additionalValue: Unlimited CommBank electronic and assisted transactions
features.additionalInfo: Additional fees apply for: international transactions, travellers cheques, foreign currency and sending money overseas; special banking services, such as bank cheques and special clearance of cheques.

eligibility.additionalInfo: This account is for anyone under the age of 18 years of age. For children 13 years or under, a parent or legal guardian will need to open the account.
Accounts must be in the child's name only and are unable to be opened as a trust.

depositRates.additionalValue: With a Youthsaver, you can earn bonus interest on balances up to $50,000 when you grow your savings balance each calendar month (this excludes interest and bank initiated transactions).

depositRates.additionalInfo: For the portion of the balance over $50,000 and/or if the bonus criteria is not met the standard rate will apply.

depositRates.additionalValue: With a Youthsaver, you can earn bonus interest on balances up to $50,000 when you grow your savings balance each calendar month (this excludes interest and bank initiated transactions).

data.name: Youthsaver Account
data.description: Designed to help teach saving skills to under 18s, our Youthsaver account offers bonus interest for reaching saving goals.
